content:
Hey #This is a blog about me, Reng, or the Bedsheet Ghost. I like making toys of all kinds. Digital, physical, and otherwise. That and martial arts has been all I’ve done my whole life, even when I am not supposed to.
This blog is a library of sorts of all the articles I have made in silence over the last 5 years. Everything from code, interesting math, and artwork will be placed here, along with my future work.
Why the sudden change of heart? #I’ve learned that my work will mean nothing if nobody can see it, so hopefully you find the content here fun to gawk at, or poke with. Much of the posts contain interactive things, made mostly for me to understand them better. I hope they do the same for you.
That’s all. Be sure to check the dates of the posts, it’s odd in my position, but it’s fun to see how the human tastes change and language change over the years.
And thank you for reading. Even if you don’t continue checking out this little corner. I hope this message was of use. I also hope that your next glass of water is extra satisfying. So cheers for living life. <3
-Reng
summary: Hey #This is a blog about me, Reng, or the Bedsheet Ghost.
title: What this blog is about
Tester
